definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="File" id="file">file</variable><variable type="JsonObject" id="object">object</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">AutoRegenDialogues</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RitualsOfTheWildsConfig</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">rituals_of_the_wilds_leshy_1.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/Rituals_of_the_wilds/dialogues/eng</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First dialogue Based with reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Bad Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Neutral Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Normal Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Good Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">High Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The trees do not ask who you were. Only what you trample now. So speak, wanderer. The moss listens.</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 What are you, really?</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Leshy> I was a god once. But the woods asked for something smaller, something quieter. So I bent. I shed teeth. I learned to grow slow.  I am not ruler. I am not guardian. I am what happens when the forest remembers its own name."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 Why do you oppose Chernobog?</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Leshy> Chernobog does not poison. He awakens. But the forest does not survive his truth.  He unearths what should stay buried. I keep it under root and soil, where it can sleep. We are not enemies. We are necessities."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 How can I help the forest?</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">leshy_sheep_feed_delivery</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">[Listen in silence.]</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Leshy> There were forests before gods. Before names. Before rot. Before hunger.  We stretched beyond horizon and silence. And even as fire claimed us, and iron cut us, we grew.  The forest will always grow again. Even through your bones."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><field name="VAR">local:file</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
